revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Please find herewith another poem I have written, the "Prayer of Columbus," which I offer for the magazine. If accepted send me word here, & a proof when ready—otherwise, please return me the MS. My price is $60—same reservation as before & same obligation on my part—
